thread.title: elena florea
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by elena florea

author: elena florea
title: elena florea
text: I was looking for a vacation on the website and I started a chat. I wrote down what I was looking for and in 5 minutes my trip to Dominican Republic was booked. She was very detailed and efficient in emailing me the paperwork. Beyond expectation! Very nice and kind person!
